column5: Why do I all of a sudden have to click on each post and response instead of just opening a post and scrolling down to read the responses.??????????????????????
Ok  thanks , found it under options. Wierd , I never changed that setting before.
it's happend to a few ppl for no reason at all.  good to hear you fixed it quick.
OK, I have one too. How come I have to double click the back button in this forum. Any other with even the same program, I only click once.
I think everyone has to double click to go back on this thing. When the x-mas skin was on i only had to 1 click
